Testa della dea egizia Iside
Cabeza de diosa egipcia Isis

이집트의 여신 이시스 머리 (여성)

Egyptian Goddess Isis Head
kDesc
Worshiped as the ideal mother and wife, she is the patron of nature and magic. [#Legal]
Vénérée en tant que mère et épouse parfaite, Isis est la grande déesse par excellence. [#Legal]
Sie ist die Schutzpatronin der Natur und Magie und wird als ideale Mutter und Ehefrau angebetet. [#Legal]
Venerata come madre e moglie ideale, patrona della natura e della magia. [#Legal]
Adorada como madre y esposa ideal, es la patrona de la naturaleza y la magia. [#Legal]
Worshiped as the ideal mother and wife, she is the patron of nature and magic. [#Legal]
완벽한 어머니와 아내로 알려진 이 여신은 자연과 마법의 수호자입니다. [#Legal]
Worshiped as the ideal mother and wife, she is the patron of nature and magic. [#Legal]
祂是自然和魔法的守護神，被供奉為理想的母親和妻子。 [#Legal]
祂是自然和魔法的守護神，被供奉為理想的母親和妻子。 [#Legal]
Worshiped as the ideal mother and wife, she is the patron of nature and magic. [#Legal]
